label: Towels and Bath Linens
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to towels, bath mats, and other bath linens.
intents: Find affordable towels for my home
Compare different types of bath linens
Find towels with specific colors or patterns
Find hooded towels for adults or children
Find beach towels for my next vacation
Find towels for my baby or child
Find towels for my business or salon

subcategories.label: Bath Towels

subcategories.description: Large towels used for drying off at the beach or pool.

subcategories.label: Hand Towels
